name: mental-health-support-platform
description: Digital Mental Health and Psychological Support System for Students in Higher Education - SIH 2025

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:client -- --fix && npm run lint:server -- --fix
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run test && echo 'Ready for deployment!'

author: SIH 2025 Team
